name: CMDB Configuration template
description: Service Now CMDB configuration record to add and remove CMDB records on create and delete of a server.

metadata.longDescription: Service Now CMDB configuration record to add and remove CMDB records on create and delete of a server.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description: Not applicable, run locally on the Terraform Server.

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: Create and Remove a CMDB Record in Service Now.

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description: python ServiceNow module deployed on the Terraform container.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. A Service Now instance must be available.
2. The Service Now instance must be network accessible from the Terraform container.
